definitions.definition: An ethnic person, especially a foreigner or member of an immigrant community.
(in classical scholarship) the demonym of an Ancient Greek city
Of or relating to a group of people having common racial, ancestral, national, religious or cultural origins.
definitions.example: There are many ethnic Indonesians in the Netherlands

definitions.definition: Characteristic of a foreign, usually non-Western culture.
definitions.example: I like to eat ethnic food

definitions.definition: Representative of a folk or traditional mode of expression.
Heathen, not Jewish, Christian, or Muslim.
